title: Graduate or Post-graduate degree in Town and country planning, urban planning, planning, regional planning or equivalent
clause_text: Graduate or Post-graduate degree in Town and country planning, urban planning, planning, regional planning or equivalent. All plans and related information connected with development permission. Issuing certificates of supervision for development of all lands. Design as per Client's requirements and site conditions.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
